description: Here you'll find my work in crafting puppets and models, combining artistry and engineering to bring characters to life.
Explore my sculpting and casting projects, where I shape, mold, and refine materials into detailed and expressive pieces.
Take a look at my work in prop and set construction, where I design and build immersive environments and intricate props.
Browse my woodworking and joinery projects, featuring handcrafted pieces that showcase precision, craftsmanship, and design.
